description: Configure a RADIUS server to use as a RADIUS Single Sign On (RSSO) server for this VDOM.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description: Name of the VDOM that you are adding the RADIUS server to.

RadiusServerVdom.description: Use this option to select another VDOM containing a VDOM RSSO RADIUS server to use for the current VDOM.

Status.description: Enable/disable the RSSO RADIUS server for this VDOM. Valid values: `enable`, `disable`.

Vdomparam.description: Specifies the vdom to which the resource will be applied when the FortiGate unit is running in VDOM mode. Only one vdom can be specified. If you want to inherit the vdom configuration of the provider, please do not set this parameter.
